backFields.label: Workshop Overview
backFields.value:
Explore models for co-housing, intentional communities, and collaborative living arrangements.

Topics:
• Legal structures for community land trusts
• Shared resource management
• Governance models and decision-making
• Financial planning for co-housing
• Case studies from successful communities

3-hour interactive workshop with Q&A.
Materials and light refreshments provided.

backFields.label: LIFT Priority Connection
backFields.value:
This learning event is offered to LIFT Certificate holders who selected 'Community Living' as a priority interest.

As a holder, you receive:
• Free access to priority learning events
• Early notification of related private placements
• Invitations to community site visits
• Access to facilitator network

Your LIFT Certificate phase progression is enhanced by event participation.

locations.relevantText: Community Living Workshop at Bell Tower Hall starting at 2:00 PM
